summary: Three traditional Han swords by Acalanatha Team
descriptionHtml:
Hello guys!
there have been a long time since we post our news work.
This time i bring u with three traditional Han swords of Ancient China, just enjoy them, with our katanas!

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4][Introduction][/size][/color][/b]

Han sword is one kind of Ancient Chinese sword, usually equipped by ones who have some social status like emperor, generals, ministers, knights, lords, even some scholars(for some reasons scholars of Ancient China have higher social status than other ordinary people)
So that means Han Swords are often regarded as a symbol of the nobility than a single weapon.
These three Han swords have different appearance, gold for emperor, silver for gentlemen, bronze for generals.
And u may find a poem when u install it.... well, that's so difficult for me to understand it and i try my best to translate it....

I wish to have a enlightened emperor,
He is tolerance and kind,
He make his people happy and peaceful.
I stare at the the infinite universe,
When and where can i meet my princess?
I venerate her and i miss her,
Her fame is as good as the noble flowers.
one day i could meet my princess.

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b][Contents][/b][/size][/color]

there are three kind of Han swords with one handed and two handedone handed swords can be crafted under Ebony and two handed under Misc
u will need Gold ingots for golden ones, Sliver ingots for silver ones and Dwarven ingots.
Also never forget steel blocks

[color=#ff0000][size=4][Installation][/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff]just click xxxx.fomod or use NMM to install (u must have NMM
[/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=4][Credits][/size][/color]

thanks Xtcom3dxiaoyaosx01 Bloodydawn and Haruto to finish the mod
Finderway for Screenshots

Acalanatha Team
author: Xtcom3d
